name: David Kim
summary: DevOps Engineer with 7 years of experience building and maintaining cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and monitoring systems. Specialized in AWS, Kubernetes, and infrastructure as code.

experience.title: Lead DevOps Engineer
responsibilities: Architected multi-region AWS infrastructure supporting 5M concurrent users
Reduced deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes using GitLab CI/CD
Implemented infrastructure as code using Terraform and Ansible
Set up comprehensive monitoring with Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK stack
Managed on-call rotation and incident response, achieving 99.95% uptime

experience.title: DevOps Engineer
responsibilities: Migrated legacy infrastructure to Kubernetes on AWS EKS
Built and maintained CI/CD pipelines for 10+ microservices
Automated infrastructure provisioning reducing setup time by 80%
Implemented security best practices including secrets management with Vault

experience.title: Systems Administrator
responsibilities: Managed Linux servers and database administration
Automated routine tasks using Python and Bash scripts

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
